title: Calories in Twinkies
meta_description: Discover calories in Twinkies per cake, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown with tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard Hostess Twinkie, one cream-filled sponge cake (38 g), no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, and recipe changes; Twinkies are processed snacks. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One Twinkie contains about 150 kcal, mostly from carbs and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Frozen Twinkie (no calorie change, but texture varies)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Twinkie?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal per standard Hostess Twinkie.
Yes, one Twinkie has 18 g of sugars, mostly added.

faqs.q: What is the protein in Twinkies?
faqs.a: Only 1 g protein per Twinkie; it's not a protein source.
Modern Twinkies have 0 g trans fat per serving.

faqs.q: Calories in a pack of Twinkies?
faqs.a: A twin pack (2 Twinkies) is about 300 kcal; check packaging for exact.
